segments.text: Wow , Amy , look at that number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean ? It's a scrim .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not to me , I wouldn't be caught dead in that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love that kind of stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you seem to like those styles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure do . I get a kick out of looking punk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one looks really expensive though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't care how much it costs . I'm rolling in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lucky you ! I can't buy anything else . I'm flat broke .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got a replace my party outfit , I trashed it last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why did you drag me into this ? I've spent a week salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you on the level ? You're the one who called me , remember ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just joking , Tonia . I've got some wonderful clothes . Let's go and have a close look at your outfit .
segments.speaker: S2
